sqlGroup.name: projectmodule
sqlGroup.sql: select nvl(loc.lang_value,pm.project_name) as name, pm.* from (SELECT lang_code, name as project_name, ICONCLS, MODULEDEFINE, MAINPANEL || ';' || ID || ';' || TABPANEL AS MODULE, MODULEPATH, MODULENAME, MPATH FROM PROJECT_MODULE WHERE ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT SP.PARENTID FROM (SELECT * FROM SUB_FUNCTION WHERE ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT MODULEID FROM ITEM_AUTHORITY WHERE AUTHID IN (SELECT AUTHID FROM ROLE_POS WHERE ROLEID = ? OR ROLEID = ?))) S LEFT JOIN PROJECT_MODULE SP ON SP.ID = S.PROJECTID)) pm left join SYS_LOCALE_CONTENT_T loc on loc.lang_code = pm.lang_code where loc.locale_key = ?

SELECT NAME, ICONCLS, MODULEDEFINE, CONCAT_WS(';', MAINPANEL, ID, TABPANEL) AS MODULE, MODULEPATH, MODULENAME,MPATH FROM PROJECT_MODULE WHERE ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT SP.PARENTID FROM (SELECT * FROM SUB_FUNCTION WHERE ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT MODULEID FROM ITEM_AUTHORITY WHERE AUTHID IN (SELECT AUTHID FROM ROLE_POS WHERE ROLEID = ? OR ROLEID = ?)) ) S LEFT JOIN PROJECT_MODULE SP ON SP.ID = S.PROJECTID) ORDER BY ID

SELECT SP.NAME || ';' || SP.ICONCLS AS NAME, S.ID || ';' || S.PATH AS ID, S.TEXT AS TEXT, S.ICONCLS FROM (SELECT * FROM SUB_FUNCTION WHERE ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT MODULEID FROM ITEM_AUTHORITY WHERE AUTHID IN (SELECT AUTHID FROM ROLE_POS WHERE ROLEID = ? OR ROLEID = ?)) ORDER BY ID) S LEFT JOIN (select loc.lang_value as name, pm.iconcls, pm.id, pm.typeid, pm.PARENTID from PROJECT_MODULE pm left join SYS_LOCALE_CONTENT_T loc on loc.lang_code = pm.lang_code where loc.locale_key = ?) SP ON SP.ID = S.PROJECTID WHERE SP.PARENTID = ? AND SP.TYPEID = ? ORDER BY SP.ID, S.ID

SELECT CONCAT_WS(';', SP.NAME, SP.ICONCLS) AS NAME, CONCAT_WS(';', S.ID, S.PATH) AS ID, S.TEXT AS TEXT, S.ICONCLS FROM (SELECT * FROM SUB_FUNCTION WHERE ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT MODULEID FROM ITEM_AUTHORITY WHERE AUTHID IN (SELECT AUTHID FROM ROLE_POS WHERE ROLEID = ? OR ROLEID = ?)) ORDER BY ID ) S LEFT JOIN PROJECT_MODULE SP ON SP.ID = S.PROJECTID WHERE SP.PARENTID = ? ORDER BY SP.ID, S.ID
SELECT ID||';'||'1' AS ID,NAME FROM PROJECT_MODULE T WHERE T.PARENTID = ?
SELECT CONCAT_WS(';',ID, '1') AS ID,NAME FROM PROJECT_MODULE T WHERE T.PARENTID = ?
